description: Export bill payments to Acumatica with international payment support, cross-rate calculation, amount validation, and release. Handles multi-currency payments.

criticalFiles.purpose: Serializes payment to Acumatica JSON with international currency support
Calculates cross-rates and amounts for international payments

anatomy.flow: Retrieve bills → Calculate amounts → Serialize → Create (Hold=true) → Update amounts → Validate balance → Release → Post
anatomy.internationalLogic: If payment currency != bill currency, use AcumaticaPaymentCalculator for cross-rate
anatomy.billLinking: ApplicationDocuments array links payment to bills

HOLD_TRUE_INITIALLY.purpose: Payments created on hold, released after validation

kotlinImplementation.futureWork: Will migrate to Kotlin after Java implementation stable

validationRules: International payments require cross-rate calculation via AcumaticaPaymentCalculator
ApplicationDocuments array must link payment to bills
Amount validation: Sum of ApplicationDocuments.AmountPaid must equal payment amount
Release and post after successful validation

dacMapping.note: Quick Check INVERTS normal container mapping - header uses Transactions, lines use Document

configuration.action: Click 'Extend Entity' button for Payment/Check entity
configuration.note: Custom fields configured per Acumatica tenant

schemaDiscovery.purpose: Discover all available custom attributes for Payment entity

putStructure.note: INVERTED: Transactions for header, Document for lines

commonIssues: Case sensitivity: Attribute IDs are UPPERCASE
Container inversion: Quick Check uses Transactions for header, Document for lines (opposite of Bill)
404 Error: Custom field not configured in SM207060 screen
International payments: Custom fields must survive cross-rate calculations
